detaileddescription.para: This package implements a RobotDriver and several applications for the TriFinger robots, using the robot_interfaces package. See there for more information on the general architecture. The action and observation types for the (Tri)Finger robots are also implemented in robot_interfaces.
We provide several demos to show how to use the interface on practical examples. Good starting points are:

listitem.para: demo_real_finger.py: Basic example on how to control the robot using either torque or position commands. This uses only a single finger but the principle is the same for the TriFinger.
demo_trifinger.py: Demo for the TriFinger, moving it in a hard-coded choreography.

simplesect.para: The demos are all in Python, however, you can do exactly the same using the C++ API.
